therefore/consequently/thus/hence/thereupon/it follows that/where?/to change (into)/ancient unit of weight and money
to warm oneself (by a fire etc)
(of the weather) to warm up again
to stay warm/to protect against the cold

to enquire solicitously about sb's well-being (idiom)/to pamper

sentences.english: No problem is permanent storms always give way to the sun.
sentences.chinese: 風暴總會給陽光讓路，寒冬總會轉變爲暖春。

sentences.english: Global warming caused a dryer and warmer climate in the centeral part of Qinghai-Tibet plateau.
sentences.chinese: 受全球變暖影響，青藏高原氣候呈現出暖幹趨勢。

sentences.english: Additional heat energy is supplied with district heating utilizing geothermally heated water.
sentences.chinese: 額外的熱能由區域集中暖提供，採用地熱加熱的水。

sentences.english: Currents of warm air keep the hang-gliders aloft.
sentences.chinese: 懸掛式滑翔機藉着暖氣流在高空飛行。

sentences.english: Eight is for a nice warm bed.
I rely on my parents to feed and clothe me.
sentences.chinese: 我仰賴父母讓我喫飽穿暖。

sentences.english: March Spring is warm, water chestnut green Mai Dang heart.
sentences.chinese: 又是三月春風暖，薺麥青青蕩心扉。

sentences.english: Both collocation, warm stomach to get better effect.
sentences.chinese: 兩者搭配，暖胃效果更佳。

sentences.english: Disputing for sunny trees, early orioles trill.
And you will be clothed with my cloak cordiality, towards bloomy spring warm spring.
sentences.chinese: 而你將披戴着我的斗篷的情意，走向春暖花開的暖春。

sentences.english: She fixed me up with enough warm clothes to last all winter.
sentences.chinese: 整個漫長的冬季，她給我足夠的暖衣。

sentences.english: As winter looms many North Koreans cannot feed or warm themselves.
sentences.chinese: 冬天已來臨，而朝鮮人們還喫不飽穿不暖。

sentences.english: The warming and drying of the climate in the plateau resulted in the decending of climate-productivity.
sentences.chinese: 黃土高原氣候暖幹化使作物氣候生產力下降。

sentences.english: What could be better on a numbingly cold winter night than a hot pot to warm your heart?
sentences.chinese: 嚴寒冬日，有什麼能比火鍋更暖人心呢？

sentences.english: Methods An electric hand warmer was transformed and tests were made many times with different movement temperature of thermostat.
sentences.chinese: 改造電熱暖手爐，用不同動作溫度的溫控器多次測試。

sentences.english: This would make the glider rise and fall as it entered warm and cold patches of water.
sentences.chinese: 這能讓滑翔器在進入暖水域上升，在進入冷領域下降。

the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)
